sahakara polis adhikariwarayaku wisin yam pudgalayaku sambandhayen podu depala panathe 8(1) waganthiya yatathe ewani sahathikayak laba dena awasthawa wana wita ema pudgalaya athadanguwata gena ho adhikaranayata bharawi ho sitiya yuthuyi.

si.bi. kusalana thunkon tharagawaliyedi panduwata paharadima, pandu yawima ha pandu rakima yana thun iriyawwenma ostreliyawata wada idiriyen sitina shri lankawa jayagrahanaye balaporoththu samanga ada adiled pitiyata piwiseyi.ti. em. dilshan tharaga 10 kadi lakunu 505 k laba pithikaruwan athara peramune sitina athara uda pandu 6k rakagena hondama pandu rakinna lesa idiriyen siti.pahara pita pahara ella weddi wuwada awasan panduwa thek uthsahaya athnoharina ‘yokar malinga‘ tharaga 10 kadi kadulu 18 k laba pandu yawannan athara wadima kadululabhiya wemin ostreliyawata tharjanayak gena enu atha.ostreliyawe wonar pithikaruwan athara dewani thana tharaga 10 kadi lakunu 458 k laba athkaragena atha.dilshan - wonar dedenama shathaka 2k ha ardha shathakaya bagin laba sitimen ada tharagaye ekineka paraya idiriyata eema dakagatha hakiwe.ostreliyawe kristin kadulu 13 k me wanawita laba athath ada tharagaye malinga parajaya kirimata nam wishala haskamak kala yuthuwa atha.pandu rakimedi dewid hasi uda pandu 5 k rakagena siti.ithihasaye sitama ostreliyawa ha shri lankawa athara tharaga, unusum muhunuwarakin nimawana heyin ada tharagayada pe්rakshaka aashwadaya nomadawa labana udwegakara satanak wanu atha.ada pawathwena awasan tharagayedi shri lanka pila uparima dakshatha atharata pathwana bawa nayaka mahela jayawardhana sandahan kaleya.me tharagawaliyedi lehesiyen tharaga dinanna apata awasthawa udawune na.ostreliyawata pamini dawase sita godak mahansi wela puhunuwim kala.
